name: Campaign
author: Sebastian Thiele

sections.description:
This Plugin adds the option to track your RSS reader or Twitter clicks by using Campaigns. You can use Google Analytics and/or Piwik.
Twitter Campagns can shorten by Bit.ly
And now you can add a QR-Code to Facebook liked Pages.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the Option Menu and change your Options
sections.faq:
What is Open Graph?

Open Graph is used by some WebPages to agregate Page-Informations. For Excampe <a href="http://developers.facebook.com/docs/opengraph/"Facebook.

What is a QR-Code?

A QR-Code is a machine readable Image that encode Informations like a Weburl.
User with readable devices like a smart phone can open the url direct in there device.

How can I support the Project?

  • You cann help to translate the Project into other languages
  • You can report bugs or features
  • You can make a donation (e.g. Flattr)
